snippet: An independent panel says California lawmakers should not authorize $2.7 billion in bonds to build the initial section of the state’s high-speed rail system.
abstract: Independent panel says California lawmakers should not authorize $2.7 billion in bonds to build the initial section of the state’s high-speed rail system.
lead_paragraph: An independent panel says California lawmakers should not authorize $2.7 billion in bonds to build the initial section of the state’s high-speed rail system.

headline.main: California: Panel Advises Against Rail Project
headline.print_headline: California: Panel Advises Against Rail Project
